DOC.brief_summary: The objective study test usability Alice PDx device end user ( patient/participant ) sleep technician . Data collect via questionnaire regard participant 's ability understand participant user manual home condition technician 's ability set Alice PDx accord health care provider manual . This study also compare physiological data record Alice PDx physiological data record predicate device Alice 5 System validate equivalence . This evaluate compare manual study score detect apnea hypopnea event event event basis standard polysomnography ( PSG ) / sleep study . The study test ability Alice PDx record good quality data determine Good Study Indicator ( GSI ) function Alice PDx firmware . The primary hypothesis participant able successfully apply Alice PDx basic lead follow participant user manual instruction sleep technician able successfully apply advanced lead preparation sleep study . In addition , demonstrate Alice PDx equivalent Alice 5 System intent record , display print physiological data clinician/physician order aid screening/follow-up diagnosis respiratory sleep disorder .
DOC.detailed_description: Alice PDx portable , diagnostic recording device . It may use obstructive sleep screen well follow-up diagnostic assessment . The device may use sleep lab clinical setting trained professional may use home patient direct health care provider . The Alice PDx device currently approve Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) . The Alice PDx device capable record various physiological input store data locally removable storage card . The device may also connect directly PC ( personal computer ) run Alice Sleepware software application . Sleepware display live pre-recorded data resolution consistent computer hardware specification .
DOC.criteria: Patients must call sleep lab refer sleep lab diagnostic polysomnogram Able follow direction Able provide inform consent Participants require supplemental oxygen therapy History previous sleep study/polysomnogram perform Current positive airway pressure ( PAP ) user Unable unwilling perform polysomnogram
